anya-e0803n2:3: Tatra ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇattasūcikā tyādayo vibhattiyo, tā aṭṭhavidhā vattamānāpañcamīsattamīparokkhāhiyyattanajjatanībhavissantī kālātipattivasena.
anya-e0803n2:4: Tatthati anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetā vattamānāvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:5: Tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṁ antaṁ, su vho, e āmase iccetā pañcamīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:6: Eyya eyyuṁ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṁ eyyāmhe iccetā sattamīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:7: A u, e ttha, aṁ mha, ttha re, ttho vho, iṁ mhe iccetā parokkhāvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:8: Ā ū, o ttha, aṁ mhā, ttha tthuṁ, se vhaṁ, iṁ mhase iccetā hiyyattanīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:9: Ī uṁ, o ttha, iṁ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṁ, aṁ mhe iccetā ajjatanīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:10: Ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṁ ssāmhe iccetā bhavissantīvibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:11: Ssā ssaṁsu, sse ssatha, ssaṁ ssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṁ ssāmhase iccetā kālātipattivibhattiyo nāma.
anya-e0803n2:12_0: Sabbāsametāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni parassapadāni
anya-e0803n2:12_1: nāma. Yāni yāni pana parāni cha padāni, tāni tāni attanopadāni nāma. Tattha parassapadāni
anya-e0803n2:12_2: vattamānā cha, pañcamiyo cha, sattamiyo cha, parokkhā cha, hiyyattaniyo cha, ajjataniyo
anya-e0803n2:12_3: cha, bhavissantiyo cha, kālātipattiyo chāti aṭṭhacattālīsavidhāni honti, tathā itarāni,
anya-e0803n2:13: Parassapadānamattanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisā nāma. Te vattamānādīsu cattāro cattāro, aṭṭhannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ vasena dvattiṁsa, piṇḍitāni parimāṇāneva.
anya-e0803n2:14: Dvīsu dvīsu padesu paṭhamaṁ paṭhamaṁ ekavacanaṁ, dutiyaṁ dutiyaṁ bahuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:15_0: Tatra vattamānavibhattīnanti anti, si tha, mi ma iccetāni parassapadāni. Te ante,
anya-e0803n2:15_1: se vhe, e mhe iccetāni attanopadāni. Parassapadattanopadesupiti anti iti paṭhamapurisā,
anya-e0803n2:15_2: sitha iti majjhimapurisā, mi ma iti uttamapurisā, te ante iti paṭhamapurisā, se vhe
anya-e0803n2:15_3: iti majjhimapurisā, e mhe iti uttamapurisā.
anya-e0803n2:16_0: Paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisesupi ti-iti ekavacanaṁ, anti-iti bahuvacananti evaṁ ekavacanabahuvacanāni
anya-e0803n2:16_1: kamato ñeyyāni. Evaṁ sesāsu vibhattīsu parassapadattanopadapaṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisekavacanabahuvacanāni ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n2:17_0: Tattha vibhattīti kenaṭṭhena vibhatti? Kālādivasena dhātvatthaṁ vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n2:17_1: syādīhi nāmikavibhattīhi saha sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana sakatthaparatthādibhede atthe
anya-e0803n2:17_2: vibhajatīti vibhatti, kammādayo vā kārake ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vibhajatīti vibhatti,
anya-e0803n2:17_3: vibhajitabbā ñāṇenātipi vibhatti, vibhajanti atthe etāyātipi vibhatti, atha vā satipi
anya-e0803n2:17_4: jinasāsane avibhattikaniddese sabbena sabbaṁ vibhattīhi vinā atthassā’niddisitabbato
anya-e0803n2:17_5: visesena vividhena vā ākārena bhajanti sevanti naṁ paṇḍitātipi vibhatti. Tattha avibhattikaniddesalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0803n2:22: Tatra thera-iti avibhattiko niddeso, therānaṁ ayanti thero. Ko so? Vādo. Theravādo aññesaṁ vādānaṁ uttamoti ayamattho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n2:26: ‘‘Bho khāda piva’’iccatra, vade yo koci codako.
anya-e0803n2:28: ‘‘Bhikkhu, bho purisi’’ccādi, padampi, na hidaṁ tathā.
anya-e0803n2:29: ‘‘Bhikkhu, bho purisi’’ccādi, si ga lopena vuccati;
anya-e0803n2:31_0: Evaṁ avibhattikaniddeso ākhyātesu na labbhati, nāmesuyeva labbhati. Tatrāpi ‘‘aṭṭha
anya-e0803n2:31_1: ca puggala dhammadasā te’’ti ettha chandavasena puggala iti rassakaraṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:31_2: na ‘‘kakusandha koṇāgamano ca kassapo’’ti ettha kakusandha iti avibhattikaniddeso
anya-e0803n2:31_3: viya avibhattikaniddeso daṭṭhabbo. ‘‘Bhikkhu nisinne mātugāmo upanisinno vā hoti
anya-e0803n2:31_4: upanipanno vā’’ti ettha pana bhikkhūti idaṁ bhikkhumhīti vattabbatthattā bhumme paccattantipi
anya-e0803n2:31_5: adiṭṭhavibhattikaniddesotipi vattuṁ yujjati. Tattha pana chandavasena katarassattā
anya-e0803n2:31_6: tāni padāni avibhattikaniddesapakkhampi bhajantīti vattuṁ na yujjati.
anya-e0803n2:32: Tattha parassapadānīti parassa atthabhūtāni padāni parassapadāni. Etthuttamapurisesu attano atthesupi attanopadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n2:36: Attanopadānīti attano atthabhūtāni padāni attanopadāni. Ettha pana paṭhamamajjhimapurisesu parassatthesupi parassapadavohāro na kariyati.
anya-e0803n2:44: Tasmā idha paṭhamapurisādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ purisānaṁ vacanatthaṁ na pariyesāma. Rūḷhiyā hi porāṇehi tyādīnaṁ purisasaññā vihitā.
anya-e0803n2:45_0: Ekavacanabahuvacanesu pana ekassatthassa vacanaṁ ekavacanaṁ. Bahūnamatthānaṁ vacanaṁ
anya-e0803n2:45_1: bahuvacanaṁ. Atha vā bahuttepi sati samudāyavasena jātivasena vā cittena sampiṇḍetvā
anya-e0803n2:45_2: ekīkatassatthassa ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṁ, bahutte nissitassa nissayavohārena
anya-e0803n2:45_3: vuttassa nissayavasena ekassa viya vacanampi ekavacanaṁ, ekattalakkhaṇena bavhatthānaṁ
anya-e0803n2:45_4: ekavacanaṁ viya vacanampi ekavacanaṁ. Abahuttepi sati attagarukārāparicchedamātikānusandhinayapucchāsabhāgaputhucitta-
anya-e0803n2:45_5: samāyogaputhuārammaṇavasena ekatthassa bahūnaṁ viya vacanaṁ bahuvacanaṁ, tathā ye
anya-e0803n2:45_6: ye bahavo tannivāsataṁputtasaṅkhātassekassatthassa rūḷhīvasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi
anya-e0803n2:45_7: bahuvacanaṁ, ekassatthassa aññenatthena ekābhidhānavasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi
anya-e0803n2:45_8: bahuvacanaṁ, ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṁ, ekassatthassa
anya-e0803n2:45_9: ārammaṇabhedakiccabhedavasena bahūnaṁ viya vacanampi bahuvacanaṁ. Evamimehi ākārehi
anya-e0803n2:45_10: ekamhi vattabbe, ekamhi viya ca vattabbe ekavacanaṁ, bahumhi vattabbe, bahumhi viya
anya-e0803n2:45_11: ca vattabbe bahuvacanaṁ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Puthuvacanaṁ, anekavacananti ca imasseva nāmaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:48_0: Tasmā tadatthaviññāpanatthaṁ idha nāmikapayogehi sahevākhyātapayoge pavakkhāma –
anya-e0803n2:48_1: ‘‘rājā āgacchati, sahāyo me āgacchati, ekaṁ citta’’ miccevamādayo ekassatthassa ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:48_2: ‘‘Rājāno āgacchanti, sahāyā me āgacchanti, na me dessā ubho puttā, dve tīṇi’’ iccevamādayo
anya-e0803n2:49_0: ‘‘Sā senā mahatī āsi, bahujjano pasannosi, sabbo taṁ jano ojināyatu, itthigumbassa
anya-e0803n2:49_1: pavarā, buddhassāhaṁ vatthayugaṁ adāsiṁ, dvayaṁ vo bhikkhave desessāmi, pemaṁ mahantaṁ
anya-e0803n2:49_2: ratanattayassa, kare pasādañca naro avassaṁ, bhikkhusaṅgho, balakāyo, devanikāyo,
anya-e0803n2:49_3: ariyagaṇo’’- iccevamādayo, ‘‘dvikaṁ tika’’miccādayo ca samudāyavasena bavhatthānaṁ ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:50_0: Katthaci pana īdisesu ṭhānesu bahuvacanapayogāpi dissanti. Tathā hi ‘‘pūjitā ñātisaṅghehi,
anya-e0803n2:50_1: devakāyā samāgatā, sabbete devanikāyā, dve devasaṅghā, tīṇi dukāni, cattāri navakāni’’
anya-e0803n2:50_2: iccevamādayo payogāpi dissanti. Ime ekavacanavasena vattabbassa samudāyassa bahusamudāyavasena
anya-e0803n2:50_3: bahuvacanapayogāti gahetabbā, saṅgayhamānā ca bavhatthabahuvacane saṅgahaṁ gacchanti
anya-e0803n2:50_4: visuṁyeva vā, tasmā bahusamudāyāpekkhabahuvacananti etesaṁ nāmaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:51: ‘‘Pāṇaṁ na hane, sasso sampajjati’’ iccevamādayo jātivasena bavhatthānaṁ ekavacanapayogā, tabbhāvasāmaññena bavhatthānaṁ ekavacanapayogātipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0803n2:52: ‘‘Nāgaṁ raṭṭhassa pūjitaṁ, sāvatthī saddhā ahosi pasannā’’ iccevamādayo nissayavasena pavattānaṁ nissayavohārena vuttānamekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:53_1: dhammavinayo, cittaseno ca gandhabbo, natiyā asati āgatigati na hoti, āgatigatiyā
anya-e0803n2:53_2: asati cutūpapāto na hoti’’ iccevamādayo ekattalakkhaṇe bavhatthānaṁ ekavacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:54: ‘‘Evaṁ mayaṁ gaṇhāma, amhākaṁ pakati, padhānanti kho meghiya vadamānaṁ kinti vadeyyāma’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa attavasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:55: ‘‘Te manussā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ ‘bhuñjatha bhante’ti, ahaṁ manussesu manussabhūtā, abbhāgatānā’sanakaṁ adāsiṁ’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa garukāravasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:56: ‘‘Appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā dhammā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa aparicchedavasena bahuvacanapayogā, aniyamitasaṅkhāvasena bahuvacanapayogā vā.
anya-e0803n2:57_0: Keci pana ‘‘desanāsotapātavasena bahuvacanapayogā’’tipi vadanti, taṁ na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:57_1: Na hi tathāgato satisampajaññarahito dhammaṁ deseti, yutti ca na dissati ‘‘mātikāyaṁ
anya-e0803n2:57_2: pucchāyaṁ vissajjane cāti tīsupi ṭhānesu appaccayādidhamme desento satthā punappunaṁ
anya-e0803n2:58: ‘‘Katame dhammā appaccayā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa mātikānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:59: ‘‘Ime dhammā appaccayā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:60: ‘‘Katame dhammā no parāmāsā, te dhamme ṭhapetvā avasesā kusalākusalābyākatā dhammā’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa pucchāsabhāgena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:61_0: ‘‘Atthi bhikkhave aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā santā paṇītā atakkāvacarā
anya-e0803n2:61_1: nipuṇā paṇḍitavedanīyā, ye tathāgato sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetī’’ti ayamekassatthassa
anya-e0803n2:62: ‘‘Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ mahāvane,
anya-e0803n2:65: Iccevamādayo saddā ye ye bahavo, tannivāsataṁputtasaṅkhātassekatthassa rūḷhīvasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:66_0: ‘‘Sāriputtamoggallāne āmantesi ‘gacchatha tumhe sāriputtā kīṭāgiriṁ gantvā assajipunabbasukānaṁ
anya-e0803n2:66_1: bhikkhūnaṁ kīṭāgirismā pabbājanīyakammaṁ karotha, tumhākaṁ ete saddhivihārino’ti’’,
anya-e0803n2:66_2: ‘‘kacci vo kulaputtā, etha byagghā nivattavho’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa aññenatthena
anya-e0803n2:67: ‘‘Mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṁ karonti’’ iccevamādayo ekassatthassa nissitavasena bahuvacanapayogā.
anya-e0803n2:69: ‘‘Cattāro sammappadhānā’’ti ayaṁ pana kiccabhedena ekassatthassa bahuvacanapayogo.
anya-e0803n2:70_1: ekattalakkhaṇekavacananti pañcavidhaṁ ekavacanaṁ bhavati. Ettha pana jātyāpekkhekavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n2:71_4: kiccabhedabahuvacananti pannarasavidhaṁ bahuvacanaṁ bhavati. Iccevaṁ vīsadhā sabbāni
anya-e0803n2:95_0: Idāni kālādivasena ākhyātappavattiṁ dīpayissāma – kālakārakapurisaparidīpakaṁ kriyālakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0803n2:95_1: ākhyātikaṁ. Tatra kālanti atītānāgatapaccuppannavasena tayo kālā, atītānāgatapaccuppannāṇattiparikappakālātipattivasena
anya-e0803n2:98: Kārakanti kammakattubhāvā. Te hi upacāramukhyasabhāvavasena karonti karaṇanti ca ‘‘kārakā’’ti vuccanti. Teva yathākkamaṁ kriyānimitta taṁsādhaka taṁsabhāvāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n2:99: Kammaṁ kattā ca bhāvo ca, iccevaṁ kārakā tidhā;
anya-e0803n2:107: Kārakattaṁ tu bhāvassa, sacepi na samīritaṁ;
anya-e0803n2:109: Kriyānipphatti natthīti, yuttitopi ca natthi taṁ;
anya-e0803n2:112_0: Purisoti ekavacanabahuvacanakā paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisā. Tattha paṭhamapuriso ākhyātapadena
anya-e0803n2:112_1: tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā tumhā’mhasaddavajjite paccattavacanabhūte
anya-e0803n2:112_2: nāmamhi ‘‘abhinīhāro samijjhati, bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesuñāṇa’’ntiādīsu viya
anya-e0803n2:112_3: payujjamānepi, taṭṭhāniyatte sati ‘‘bhāsati vā karoti vā, pīḷiyakkhoti maṁ vidū,
anya-e0803n2:112_4: vuccatīti vacana’’ntiādīsu viya appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti. Katthaci
anya-e0803n2:112_5: pana pāḷippadese nāmassa appayuttattā paṭhamapurisapayogattho duranubodho bhavati,
anya-e0803n2:112_6: yathā ‘‘dukkhaṁ te vedayissāmi, tattha assāsayantu ma’’nti. Tathā hi ettha ‘‘pādā’’ti
anya-e0803n2:112_7: pāṭhaseso, tasmiṁ dukkhasāsanārocane vattuṁ avisahanavasena kilamantaṁ maṁ devassa
anya-e0803n2:112_8: ubho pādā assāsentu, vissaṭṭho kathehīti maṁ vadathāti adhippāyo ca bhavati.
anya-e0803n2:114: Tasmā upaṭṭhahaṁ gaṇhe, garuṁ garumataṁ vidū.
anya-e0803n2:115_0: Tatrimāni bhūdhātādhikārattā bhūdhātuvasena nidassanapadāni. So paribhavati, te paribhavanti,
anya-e0803n2:115_1: paribhavati, paribhavanti. Sapatto abhibhaviyate, sabbā vityā’nubhūyate, abhibhaviyate,
anya-e0803n2:115_2: anubhūyateti. Yattha satipi nāmassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena
anya-e0803n2:115_3: tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati, tattha kammavācakaṁ paccattavacanabhūtaṁ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṁ
anya-e0803n2:115_4: paṭicca paṭhamapurisādayo tayo labbhanti. Taṁ yathā? Paribhaviyyate puriso devadattena,
anya-e0803n2:115_5: paribhaviyyase tvaṁ devadattena, paribhaviyyamhe mayaṁ akusalehi dhammehi. Ettha
anya-e0803n2:115_6: panidaṁ vacanaṁ na vattabbaṁ ‘‘nindanti tuṇhimāsina’ntiādīsu satipi nāmassa kammavācakatte
anya-e0803n2:115_7: apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhatīti paṭhamapurisuppatti
anya-e0803n2:115_8: na siyā’’ti. Kasmāti ce? ‘‘Nindanti tuṇhimāsina’’ntiādīsu ‘‘janā’’ti ajjhāharitabbassa
anya-e0803n2:116_0: Majjhimapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte
anya-e0803n2:116_1: tumhasadde payujjamānepi, taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n2:116_2: Tvaṁ atibhavasi, tumhe atibhavatha, atibhavasi, atibhavatha. Tvaṁ paribhaviyase devadattena,
anya-e0803n2:116_3: tumhe paribhaviyavhe. Yattha satipi tumhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā
anya-e0803n2:116_4: ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā na labbhati, na tattha majjhimapuriso hoti. Itare
anya-e0803n2:116_5: pana dve honti kammavācakaṁ paccattavacanabhūtaṁ tulyādhikaraṇapadaṁ paṭicca. Taṁ
anya-e0803n2:116_6: yathā? Tayā abhibhaviyate sapatto, tayā abhibhaviye ahaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:117_0: Uttamapuriso ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇe sādhakavācake vā kammavācake vā paccattavacanabhūte
anya-e0803n2:117_1: amhasadde payujjamānepi, taṭṭhāniyatte sati appayujjamānepi sabbadhātūhi paro hoti.
anya-e0803n2:117_2: Ahaṁ paribhavāmi, mayaṁ paribhavāma, paribhavāmi, paribhavāma. Ahaṁ paribhaviyyāmi
anya-e0803n2:117_3: akusalehi dhammehi, mayaṁ paribhaviyyāma, paribhaviyyāmi, paribhaviyyāma. Yattha
anya-e0803n2:117_4: satipi amhasaddassa sādhakavācakatte apaccattavacanattā ākhyātapadena tulyādhikaraṇatā
anya-e0803n2:117_5: na labbhati, na tattha uttamapuriso hoti. Itare pana dve honti kammavācakaṁ paccattavacanabhūtaṁ
anya-e0803n2:117_6: tulyādhikaraṇapadaṁ paṭicca. Taṁ yathā? Mayā anubhaviyate sampatti, mayā abhibhaviyase
anya-e0803n2:117_7: tvaṁ. Evaṁ yattha yattha sādhakavācakānaṁ vā kammavācakānaṁ vā nāmādīnaṁ paccattavacanabhūtānaṁ
anya-e0803n2:117_8: ākhyātapadehi tulyādhikaraṇatte laddhe tattha tattha paṭhamapurisādayo labbhanti,
anya-e0803n2:117_9: tasmā nāmādīnaṁ paccattavacanabhūtānaṁ tulyādhikaraṇabhāvoyeva paṭhamapurisādīnamuppattiyā kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:118_0: Dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā purisānamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo. Ettha ekābhidhānaṁ
anya-e0803n2:118_1: nāma ekato abhidhānaṁ ekakālābhidhānañca. Tañca kho casaddapayogeyeva, acasaddapayoge
anya-e0803n2:118_3: bhavāma’’ iccevamādayo tappayogā. Tattha tumhe atthakusalā bhavatha – iccetasmiṁ
anya-e0803n2:118_4: vohāre ‘‘so ca atthakusalo bhavati, tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, tumhe atthakusalā
anya-e0803n2:118_5: bhavathā’’ti evaṁ dvinnamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo. ‘‘Mayamatthakusalā bhavāma’’
anya-e0803n2:118_6: iccetasmiṁ pana ‘‘so ca atthakusalo bhavati, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā
anya-e0803n2:118_7: bhavāmā’’ti vā ‘‘tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā
anya-e0803n2:118_8: bhavāmā’’ti vā evampi dvinnamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo. ‘‘So ca atthakusalo
anya-e0803n2:118_9: bhavati, tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā
anya-e0803n2:118_10: bhavāmā’’ti vā ‘‘so ca atthakusalo bhavati, te ca atthakusalā bhavanti, tvañca atthakusalo
anya-e0803n2:118_11: bhavasi, tumhe ca atthakusalā bhavatha, ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, mayamatthakusalā
anya-e0803n2:118_12: bhavāmā’’ti vā evaṁ tiṇṇamekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n2:119_0: Aparopi atthanayo vuccati – ‘‘tvañca atthakusalo bhavasi, so ca atthakusalo bhavati,
anya-e0803n2:119_1: tumhe atthakusalā bhavathā’’ti vā ‘‘ahañca atthakusalo bhavāmi, so ca atthakusalo
anya-e0803n2:119_2: bhavati, mayamatthakusalā bhavāmā’’ti vā iminā nayena anekappabhedo atthanayo. Evaṁ
anya-e0803n2:119_3: sesāsu vibhattīsu pañcamīsattamiyādīsu paropuriso gahetabbo. Sabbesu ca kriyāpadesu
anya-e0803n2:119_4: bavhatthavācakesu bahuvacanantesu, na pana bahuvacanantesupi ekassattano vācakesu
anya-e0803n2:119_5: garukātabbassekassatthassa vācakesu ca kriyāpadesu. Ettha codanāsandīpaniyo imā gāthā –
anya-e0803n2:125: Pacchā vutto paro nāma, saññāya paṭipāṭiyā;
anya-e0803n2:127: Paṭhamamhā paro nāma, majjhimo uttamopi ca;
anya-e0803n2:128: Majjhimamhā paro nāma, uttamo puriso ruto.
anya-e0803n2:131: ‘‘Tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, eso cāpi mahāmigo’’;
anya-e0803n2:132: Iti pāṭho yato diṭṭho, tasmā evaṁ vademase.
anya-e0803n2:133: ‘‘Tumhe dve sukhitā hotha’’, iccattho tattha dissati;
anya-e0803n2:138: Tvañca jānapadā ceva, negamā ca samāgatā’’.
anya-e0803n2:141: Etā gāthāpi etassa, atthassa pana sādhikā;
anya-e0803n2:143: Evaṁ viññūhi viññeyyaṁ, bahunā bhāsitena kiṁ.
anya-e0803n2:145: Na virujjhati ce attho, taṁ pamāṇaṁ sudhīmataṁ.
anya-e0803n2:150: Saṅkhepatopettha purisappavatti evaṁ upalakkhitabbā ‘‘amhavacanatthe uttamo, tumhavacanatthe majjhimo, aññesaṁ vacanatthe paṭhamo’’ti.
anya-e0803n2:151: Tyādīnaṁ purisasaññā, yasmā vuttā tato idaṁ;
anya-e0803n2:154: Kriyālakkhaṇanti ettha kathaṁ ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇatā veditabbā?
anya-e0803n2:155: Lakkhiyati kriyāyetaṁ, kriyā vā assa lakkhaṇaṁ;
anya-e0803n2:156: Kriyālakkhaṇatā evaṁ, veditabbā tathā hi ca.
anya-e0803n2:178_0: Evaṁ kālesu vibhattippavattiṁ ñatvā ye te suttantesu vicittā suvisadavipulatikhiṇabuddhivisayabhūtā
anya-e0803n2:178_1: payogā dissanti, tesu pāṭavamicchantehi tyādikkamena vuccamānā kriyāpadamālā sallakkhitabbā
anya-e0803n2:178_2: – bhavati, bhavanti. Bhavasi, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase,
anya-e0803n2:178_3: bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavāmhe. Ayaṁ aññayogādirahitā kriyāpadamālā.
anya-e0803n2:179_0: Dissanti ca suttantesu atthasambhavepi aññayogādirahitāni kriyāpadāni. Seyyathidaṁ?
anya-e0803n2:179_1: ‘‘Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti, yadā paññāya passati. Yaṁ maṁ bhaṇasi sārathi. Aññaṁ sepaṇṇi
anya-e0803n2:180_0: Ettha tividho kriyāpadesu yogo tayogo, mayogo, aññayogo ca. Tattha majjhimapurisā
anya-e0803n2:180_1: tayogavasena gahetabbā, uttamapurisā mayogavasena. Paṭhamapurisā aññayogavasena.
anya-e0803n2:183_0: Sotūnaṁ payogesu kosallatthaṁ aññayogādisahitamaparampi kriyāpadamālaṁ vadāma – so
anya-e0803n2:183_1: bhavati, te bhavanti. Tvaṁ bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ bhavāma.
anya-e0803n2:183_2: So bhavate, te bhavante. Tvaṁ bhavase, tumhe bhavavhe. Ahaṁ bhave, mayaṁ bhavāmhe.
anya-e0803n2:184_0: Dissanti ca suttantesu aññayogādisahitānipi kriyāpadāni. Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Yaṁpāyaṁ
anya-e0803n2:184_1: deva kumāro suppatiṭṭhitapādo, idampimassa mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n2:184_2: tassimāni satta ratanāni bhavanti. Yo dandhakāle tarati , taraṇīye ca dandhati, tvaṁsi
anya-e0803n2:184_3: ācariyo mama, ahampi daṭṭhukāmosmi, pitaraṁ me idhāgataṁ’’ iccevamādīni etassatthassa
anya-e0803n2:185_0: Yo tumhasaddena vattabbe atthe nipatati, na pana hoti tumhatthavācako, neso saddo
anya-e0803n2:185_1: kriyāpadassa tayogasahitattaṁ sādheti, aññadatthu aññayogasahitattaññeva sādheti.
anya-e0803n2:185_2: Yo ca amhasaddena vattabbe atthe nipatati, na pana hoti amhatthavācako, na sopi saddo
anya-e0803n2:185_3: kriyāpadassa mayogasahitattaṁ sādheti, aññadatthu aññayogasahitattaññeva sādheti.
anya-e0803n2:186_0: Tatra tumhasaddena tāva vattabbatthe – ‘‘na bhavaṁ eti puññatthaṁ, sivirājassa dassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:186_1: Māyasmā samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami. Idha bhante bhagavā paṁsukūlaṁ dhovatū’’ti
anya-e0803n2:186_2: iccevamādayo payogā. Amhasaddena pana vattabbatthe ‘‘upāli taṁ mahāvīra, pāde vandati
anya-e0803n2:186_3: satthuno. Sāvako te mahāvīra, saraṇo vandati satthuno’’ti ca iccevamādayo payogā.
anya-e0803n2:186_4: Idametthupalakkhitabbaṁ ‘‘tvaṁ tumhe ahaṁ maya’’nti atthadīpaka tayoga mayogato añño
anya-e0803n2:186_5: aññatthadīpano payogoyeva aññayogo nāma, tattha paṭhamapuriso bhavatīti.
anya-e0803n2:187_0: Yajjevaṁ ‘‘sabbāyasaṁ kūṭamatippamāṇaṁ, paggayha so tiṭṭhasi antalikkhe. Esa sutvā
anya-e0803n2:187_1: pasīdāmi, vaco te isisattamā’’tiādīsu kathaṁ. Ettha hi majjhimuttamapurisasambhavoyeva
anya-e0803n2:187_2: dissati, na tu paṭhamapurisasambhavoti? Vuccate – ‘‘sabbāyasaṁ kūṭamatippamāṇaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:187_4: syādyantānaṁ padānaṁ dassanato accantamajjhāharitabbehi samānādhikaraṇattā tagguṇabhūtattā
anya-e0803n2:187_5: ca majjhimuttamapurisasambhavo samadhigantabbo. Īdisesu payogesu syādyantānaṁ dassanavasena
anya-e0803n2:187_6: avijjamānānipi ajjhāharitabbāni ‘‘tvamaha’’miccādīni padāni bhavanti. Katthaci pana
anya-e0803n2:187_7: paripuṇṇāni dissanti ‘‘sātvaṁ vaṅkamanuppattā, kathaṁ maddi karissasi. So ahaṁ vicarissāmi,
anya-e0803n2:188: Ākhyātikassa kriyālakkhaṇattā aliṅgabhedattā ca tiṇṇaṁ liṅgānaṁ sādhāraṇabhāvaparidīpanatthaṁ aparampi kriyāpadamālaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0803n2:189_0: Puriso bhavati, kaññā bhavati, cittaṁ bhavati, purisā bhavanti, kaññāyo bhavanti,
anya-e0803n2:189_1: cittāni bhavanti. Bho purisa tvaṁ bhavasi, bhoti kaññe tvaṁ bhavasi, bho citta tvaṁ
anya-e0803n2:189_2: bhavasi, bhavanto purisā tumhe bhavatha, bhotiyo kaññāyo tumhe bhavatha, bhavanto
anya-e0803n2:189_3: cittāni tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṁ puriso bhavāmi, ahaṁ kaññā bhavāmi, ahaṁ cittaṁ bhavāmi,
anya-e0803n2:189_4: mayaṁ purisā bhavāma, mayaṁ kaññāyo bhavāma, mayaṁ cittāni bhavāma.
anya-e0803n2:190: Esa nayo attanopadesu, sesavibhattīnaṁ sabbapadesupi. Ayamākhyātikassa tiṇṇaṁ liṅgānaṁ sādhāraṇabhāvaparidīpanī kriyāpadamālāva.
anya-e0803n2:191_1: ko attho? Itthipumanapuṁsakānaṁ avisesattho vuccate ‘‘aliṅgabheda’’miti. Yathā ‘‘puriso
anya-e0803n2:191_2: gacchati, kaññā gacchati, cittaṁ gacchatī’’ti. Catudhā uddiṭṭhakriyāpadesu yathā
anya-e0803n2:191_5: gahetvā ‘‘ubbhavati ubbhavanti ubbhavasī’’tiādinā kriyāpadamālā sabbathā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n2:191_7: ca ekārānantaratyantapadāni gahetvā pāḷinayānusāreneva padamālā kātabbā, nayidha
anya-e0803n2:191_8: vuttanayānusārena. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu duranubodhā kriyāpadagati. Ato labbhamānavasena
anya-e0803n2:191_9: kriyāpadamālā kātabbā. Na hi loke lokiyā sabbe dhātusadde paccekaṁ sabbehipi channavutiyā
anya-e0803n2:191_10: vacanehi yojetvā vadanti, evaṁ avadantānampi nesaṁ kathā aparipuṇṇā nāma na hoti,
anya-e0803n2:191_11: tasmā vajjetabbaṭṭhānaṁ vajjetvā yathāsambhavaṁ padamālā kātabbā. Evaṁ pañcamiyādīsupi
anya-e0803n2:192_0: Ito paṭṭhāya pana yathuddiṭṭhapadāneva pariṇāmetvā pariṇāmetvā pañcamiyādīnaṁ mātikābhāvena
anya-e0803n2:192_1: gahetabbāni. Idāni pana tayogādisahitāsahitavasena dvidhā kriyāpadamālāyo dassessāma
anya-e0803n2:192_2: kvacādesavasena sambhūtāni ca rūpantarāni sotūnaṁ sukhadhāraṇatthañceva purisappayoge asammohatthañca.
anya-e0803n2:193_0: Bhavatu, bhavantu. Bhavāhi, bhava, bhavatha. Bhavāmi, bhavāma. Bhavataṁ, bhavantaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:193_1: Bhavassu, bhavavho. Bhave, bhavāmase. So bhavatu, te bhavantu. Tvaṁ bhavāhi, bhava,
anya-e0803n2:193_2: tumhe bhavatha. Ahaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ bhavāma. So bhavataṁ, te bhavantaṁ. Tvaṁ bhavassu,
anya-e0803n2:193_3: tumhe bhavavho. Ahaṁ bhave, mayaṁ bhavāmase. Ayaṁ pañcamīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n2:194_0: Bhaveyya, bhave, bhaveyyuṁ. Bhaveyyāsi, bhaveyyātha. Bhaveyyāmi, bhaveyyāma, bhavemu.
anya-e0803n2:194_1: Bhavetha, bhaveraṁ. Bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho. Bhaveyyaṁ, bhaveyyāmhe iti vā, so bhaveyya
anya-e0803n2:194_2: , bhave, te bhaveyyuṁ. Tvaṁ bhaveyyāsi, tumhe bhaveyyātha. Ahaṁ bhaveyyāmi, mayaṁ
anya-e0803n2:194_3: bhaveyyāma, bhavemu. So bhavetha, te bhaveraṁ. Tvaṁ bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyāvho.
anya-e0803n2:194_4: Ahaṁ bhaveyyaṁ, mayaṁ bhaveyyāmhe iti vā. Ayaṁ sattamīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n2:195_0: Babhūva, babhūvu. Babhūve, babhūvittha. Babhūvaṁ, babhūvimha. Babhūvittha, babhūvire.
anya-e0803n2:195_1: Babhūvittho, babhūvivho. Babhūviṁ, babhūvimhe iti vā, so babhūva, te babhūvu. Tvaṁ
anya-e0803n2:195_2: babhūve, tumhe babhūvittha. Ahaṁ babhūvaṁ, mayaṁ babhūvimha. So babhūvittha, te babhūvire.
anya-e0803n2:195_3: Tvaṁ babhūvittho, tumhe babhūvivho. Ahaṁ babhūviṁ, mayaṁ babhūvimhe iti vā. Ayaṁ
anya-e0803n2:196_0: Abhavā, abhavū. Abhavo, abhavattha. Abhavaṁ, abhavamhā. Abhavattha, abhavatthuṁ.
anya-e0803n2:196_1: Abhavase, abhavavhaṁ. Abhaviṁ, abhavamhase iti vā, so abhavā, te abhavū. Tvaṁ abhavo,
anya-e0803n2:196_2: tumhe abhavattha. Ahaṁ abhavaṁ, mayaṁ abhavamhā. So abhavattha, te abhavatthuṁ. Tvaṁ
anya-e0803n2:196_3: abhavase, tumhe abhavavhaṁ. Ahaṁ abhaviṁ, mayaṁ abhavamhase iti vā. Ayaṁ hiyyattanīvibhattivasena
anya-e0803n2:197_0: Abhavi, abhavuṁ. Abhavo, abhavittha. Abhaviṁ, abhavimhā. Abhavā, abhavū. Abhavase,
anya-e0803n2:197_1: abhavivhaṁ. Abhavhaṁ, abhavimhe iti vā, so abhavi, te abhavuṁ. Tvaṁ abhavo, tumhe
anya-e0803n2:197_2: abhavittha. Ahaṁ abhaviṁ, mayaṁ abhavimhā. So abhavā, te abhavū. Tvaṁ abhavase, tumhe
anya-e0803n2:197_3: abhavivhaṁ. Ahaṁ abhavaṁ, mayaṁ abhavimhe iti vā. Ayaṁ ajjatanīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n2:198_0: Ettha panajjataniyā uṁvacanassa iṁsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarānipi veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n2:198_1: Seyyathidaṁ? Te bhaviṁsu, samubbhaviṁsu, pabhaviṁsu, parābhaviṁsu, sambhaviṁsu, pātubhaviṁsu,
anya-e0803n2:198_2: pātubbhaviṁsu , imāni akammakapadāni. Paribhaviṁsu, abhibhaviṁsu, adhibhaviṁsu, atibhaviṁsu,
anya-e0803n2:201_0: Tatrāyaṁ pāḷi – ‘‘evaṁvihāriñcāvuso bhikkhuṁ rūpā adhibhosuṁ, na bhikkhu rūpe adhibhosī’’ti.
anya-e0803n2:201_1: Imāni sakammakapadāni, evamajjataniyā uṁvacanassa iṁsumādesavasena bhavatino rūpantarāni bhavanti. Apica
anya-e0803n2:204: Tatrāyaṁ pāḷi – so tena kammena divaṁ samakkami, sukhañca khiḍḍāratiyo ca anvabhīti. Tattha anvabhīti anu abhīti chedo. Anūti upasaggo. Abhīti ākhyātikapadanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n2:205_0: Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi, bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate,
anya-e0803n2:205_1: bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe. Bhavissaṁ, bhavissāmhe iti vā, so bhavissati,
anya-e0803n2:205_2: te bhavissanti. Tvaṁ bhavissasi, tumhe bhavissatha. Ahaṁ bhavissāmi, mayaṁ bhavissāma.
anya-e0803n2:205_3: So bhavissate, te bhavissante. Tvaṁ bhavissase, tumhe bhavissavhe. Ahaṁ bhavissaṁ,
anya-e0803n2:205_4: mayaṁ bhavissāmhe iti vā. Ayaṁ bhavissantīvibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n2:206_0: Abhavissā, abhavissaṁsu. Abhavisse, abhavissatha. Abhavissaṁ, abhavissāmhā. Abhavissatha,
anya-e0803n2:206_1: abhavissisu. Abhavissase, abhavissavhe. Abhavissiṁ, abhavissāmhase iti vā, so abhavissā,
anya-e0803n2:206_2: te abhavissaṁsu. Tvaṁ abhavisse, tumhe abhavissatha. Ahaṁ abhavissaṁ, mayaṁ abhavissāmhā.
anya-e0803n2:206_3: So abhavissatha, te abhavissisu. Tvaṁ abhavissase, tumhe abhavissavhe. Ahaṁ abhavissiṁ,
anya-e0803n2:206_4: mayaṁ abhavissāmhase iti vā. Ayaṁ kālātipattivibhattivasena kriyāpadamālāniddeso.
anya-e0803n2:211: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
